comment: This class is honestly a lot of work it is not an  easy elective class Super easy assignments just be ready to actually participate and run. Love her she is a  great teacher and person. She got me into running again.
Super awesome! Not judgemental, let's you walk. Totally awesome

She creates easy 2-3 mile long trails you follow in class. It doesn't matter if you run, jog, or even walk the whole entire class. She doesn't grade based on how fast you are. You just have to participate. Gives out 2-3 small homework assignments, but the final is based off info she repeats in class so many times that you do not need to ever study.

I will never take her again! I missed two classes for court reasonings and she then tells me a day of the final that i missed alot of assignments and alot of days of class which is a lie!!!! She never gives back work and is hard to get in contact with about grades! This is a 1 credit class that i took only to be full time and im very dissapointed!
